text:
="preserve">Zapata County is a county in the U.S. state of Texas. It was founded in 1858. [http://www.naco.org/Template.cfm?Section=Find_a_County&Template=/cffiles/counties/county.cfm&id=48505] In 2005, 13,373 people lived there. [http://www.naco.org/Template.cfm?Section=Find_a_County&Template=/cffiles/counties/county.cfm&id=48505] Its county seat is Zapata.
Geography.
The county has a total area of 1,058 square miles (2,740 km²).
